DOC.brief_title: Ingestion Lipids Changes Cerebral Blood Flow People With Obesity
DOC.criteria: Live Ribeirão Preto , São Paulo Brazil . Regular menses . Weight inferior 120 Kg body mass index ( BMI ) 30 40 kg/m2 , group obesity . BMI 18,5 24,9 kg/m2 , group without obesity . High blood pressure , diabetes , glucose intolerance impair fasting glycemia , metabolic syndrome , hypothyroidism kidney , liver , heart neurologic disease . Psychiatric disorder , alcoholism , smoke illicit drug abuse . Pregnancy desire pregnant Use medication , exclude contraceptive . Contraindication magnetic resonance imaging . Be treatment obesity .
